Class NeuralNetworkOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccc.deeplearning.optimize.NeuralNetworkOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Optimizable, Optimizable.ByGradientValue, NeuralNetEpochListener, Serializable

    DenoisingAutoEncoderOptimizer, RBMOptimizer

    public abstract class NeuralNetworkOptimizer
extends Object
implements Optimizable.ByGradientValue, Serializable, NeuralNetEpochListener
    Performs basic beam search based on the network's loss function

    Adam Gibson
